name: English Muffin Breakfast Pizzas
author: Pam Cooking Spray
summary: Toasted English muffins make a perfect crust for mini breakfast pizzas.
ingredients: ½ pound Odom's Tennessee Pride® Mild Country Sausage, thawed if frozen
½ cup chopped green bell pepper
½ cup chopped fresh button mushrooms
1 ½ cups shredded part-skim mozzarella cheese
directions: Place English muffin halves on baking sheet; set aside
Spray large skillet with cooking spray
Add sausage, onion, bell pepper and mushrooms; cook 5 minutes or until sausage is crumbled and vegetables are tender, stirring occasionally
Remove from skillet and keep warm
Add eggs to same skillet; sprinkle with salt and black pepper
Cook without stirring until edges and bottom begin to set
Gently turn to scramble; continue cooking until set
Broil English muffin halves 2 minutes or until toasted
Top halves evenly with sausage mixture, scrambled eggs and cheese
Broil 3 minutes more or until cheese melts
